column4: hello, I mounted an external harddrive through smbmount, but arabic characters are showed with ???? marks, anybody can help?
smbmoun to mount external HDD?~ you mean windows share right?
yes the harddrive exports data via windows share
Autodidactite file names with arabic names seen as ????.doc
you didn't set the character set
mount with mount option "iocharset=utf8"
oh thank you, I seen this in the man page, but didn't know what iocharset
let me try , few mins
unfortunately, didn't work out
the command accepted however
this is the command: smbmount //192.168.1.253/users /media/HD_users/ -o username=xyz,password=abc,iocharset=utf8
what version of windows you use ~? you may have to try other codepages.
the harddrive doens't run windows, its an external disk with network interface and people just get into share and find files. I'm trying to mount in order to copy the files to my system
can't gnome nautilus automount it ?
actually no gnome installed , I have ubuntu server
do you suggest to install one?
I will try to use mount -t cifs
ops!  I figured that I'm on the directory mounted, I was umount while I'm in the directory itselt :)
so it worked?
iocharset worked correctly, thank you!
lol~ good for you , i think they should have make utf8 as default by now ~ but oh well ~
yes it worked, yes it should be by default
thanks
